function.name: search_internet_duckduckgo
function.description: Search the internet using DuckDuckGo. Use this when you need to find current information, look up facts, or research topics online. Returns a list of search results with titles, snippets, and URLs.

query.description: The search query. Be specific and clear about what you're looking for.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-20). Defaults to 5.
